resp = client.search(
    index="my-index",
    runtime_mappings={
        "http.response": {
            "type": "long",
            "script": "\n        String response=dissect('%{clientip} %{ident} %{auth} [%{@timestamp}] \"%{verb} %{request} HTTP/%{httpversion}\" %{response} %{size}').extract(doc[\"message\"].value)?.response;\n        if (response != null) emit(Integer.parseInt(response));\n      "
        }
    },
    query={
        "match": {
            "http.response": "304"
        }
    },
    fields=[
        "http.response"
    ],
)
print(resp)
